# rsa-pop-quiz - Points: 200
<b>Description : </b>Class, take your seats! It's PRIME-time for a quiz... nc 2019shell1.picoctf.com 53028<br>
<b>Hints : </b>RSA info (https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/RSA_algorithm)
# Solved
First cases We need to find <b>n</b>
```
#### NEW PROBLEM ####
q : 60413
p : 76753
##### PRODUCE THE FOLLOWING ####
n
```
symbol which the formula is <b>q x p</b> and the result is
```
60413 * 76753 = 4636878989
```
Second cases we need to find <b>q</b> 
```
#### NEW PROBLEM ####
p : 54269
n : 5051846941
##### PRODUCE THE FOLLOWING ####
q
```
symbol which the formula is <b>n / p</b> and the result is
```
5051846941 / 54269 = 93089
```
Third cases we need to find <b>p and q</b>
```
#### NEW PROBLEM ####
e : 3
n : 
##### PRODUCE THE FOLLOWING ####
q
p
```
Since that is big number and we need to factor it, im just answer No. So lets go to the next cases!<br>
Cases 4 we need to find <b>totient(n)</b>
```
#### NEW PROBLEM ####
q : 66347
p : 12611
##### PRODUCE THE FOLLOWING ####
totient(n)
```
symbol which the formula is <b>(q - 1) x (p - 1)</b>
```
(66347 - 1) * (12611 - 1) = 836623060
```
Cases 5 we need to find <b>ciphertext</b>
```
#### NEW PROBLEM ####
plaintext : 6357294171489311547190987615544575133581967886499484091352661406414044440475205342882841236357665973431462491355089413710392273380203038793241564304774271529108729717
e : 3
n : 
##### PRODUCE THE FOLLOWING ####
ciphertext
```
To solve this im using python script
```python
from Crypto.Util.number import inverse
pow(plaintext, e, n)

# 
```
Cases 6, we Skip it. Causes we doesn't have a key to decryption.<br>
Cases 7 we need to find <b>d</b>
```
#### NEW PROBLEM ####
q : 
p : 
e : 65537
##### PRODUCE THE FOLLOWING ####
d
```
symbol which the formula is <b>modinv(e, (p-1) * (q-1))</b>
```python
def egcd(a, b):
    if a == 0:
        return (b, 0, 1)
    g, y, x = egcd(b%a,a)
    return (g, x - (b//a) * y, y)

def modinv(a, m):
    g, x, y = egcd(a, m)
    if g != 1:
        raise Exception('No modular inverse')
    return x%m
```
Cases 8 we need to find <b>plaintext</b>
```
#### NEW PROBLEM ####
p : 
ciphertext : 
e : 65537
n : 
##### PRODUCE THE FOLLOWING ####
plaintext
```
So we need to find plaintext in this cases. im using online calculator to do this http://www.javascripter.net/math/calculators/100digitbigintcalculator.htm
```python
# Since we don't have q, we divided with p
d = modinv(e, (p - 1) * (n / p - 1))
print (pow(ciphertext, d, n))
"14311663942709674867122208214901970650496788151239520971623411712977120619528460123336291453"
```
And we got this message
```
#### TIME TO SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOT! ###
plaintext: 14311663942709674867122208214901970650496788151239520971623411712977120619528460123336291453
Outstanding move!!!

If you convert the last plaintext to a hex number, then ascii, you'll find what you need! ;)
```
After we convert to decimal we got this
```
7069636F4354467B7741385F74683474245F696C6C336147616C2E2E6F31383238643335377D
```
We knew the message tell us to find the flag, im using https://codebeautify.org/hex-string-converter to convert and got the flag !<br>
Flag : <b>picoCTF{wA8_th4t$_ill3aGal..o1828d357}</b>
